comments.en:
I have a KX-P2624 wide carriage 24 pin dot matrix printer that I just installed in Red Hat Linux 6.2. I set my printer to emulate the Epson LQ 1050 and selected the following driver from the list: Epson Dot Matrix 24 pin. The setup worked for the three set up tests: ASCII, PostScript, and direct to port. Haven't tried anything else yet. This driver should work for most Panasonic 24 pin dot matrix printers.

Consumables/Refills: cartridge ribbon
